items.headline: Our agreement with the Department of War

content.excerpt_text: Details on OpenAI’s contract with the Department of War, outlining safety redlines, legal protections, and how AI systems will be deployed in classified environments.

source_payload.html: Details on OpenAI’s contract with the Department of War, outlining safety redlines, legal protections, and how AI systems will be deployed in classified environments.

items.headline: Joint Statement from OpenAI and Microsoft

content.excerpt_text: Microsoft and OpenAI continue to work closely across research, engineering, and product development, building on years of deep collaboration and shared success.

source_payload.html: Microsoft and OpenAI continue to work closely across research, engineering, and product development, building on years of deep collaboration and shared success.

items.headline: OpenAI and Amazon announce strategic partnership

content.excerpt_text: OpenAI and Amazon announce a strategic partnership bringing OpenAI’s Frontier platform to AWS, expanding AI infrastructure, custom models, and enterprise AI agents.

source_payload.html: OpenAI and Amazon announce a strategic partnership bringing OpenAI’s Frontier platform to AWS, expanding AI infrastructure, custom models, and enterprise AI agents.

items.headline: Scaling AI for everyone

content.excerpt_text: Today we’re announcing $110B in new investment at a $730B pre money valuation. This includes $30B from SoftBank, $30B from NVIDIA, and $50B from Amazon.

source_payload.html: Today we’re announcing $110B in new investment at a $730B pre money valuation. This includes $30B from SoftBank, $30B from NVIDIA, and $50B from Amazon.

items.headline: Introducing the Stateful Runtime Environment for Agents in Amazon Bedrock

content.excerpt_text: Stateful Runtime for Agents in Amazon Bedrock brings persistent orchestration, memory, and secure execution to multi-step AI workflows powered by OpenAI.

source_payload.html: Stateful Runtime for Agents in Amazon Bedrock brings persistent orchestration, memory, and secure execution to multi-step AI workflows powered by OpenAI.

items.headline: An update on our mental health-related work

content.excerpt_text: OpenAI shares updates on its mental health safety work, including parental controls, trusted contacts, improved distress detection, and recent litigation developments.

source_payload.html: OpenAI shares updates on its mental health safety work, including parental controls, trusted contacts, improved distress detection, and recent litigation developments.

items.headline: Pacific Northwest National Laboratory and OpenAI partner to accelerate federal permitting

content.excerpt_text: OpenAI and Pacific Northwest National Laboratory introduce DraftNEPABench, a new benchmark evaluating how AI coding agents can accelerate federal permitting—showing potential to reduce NEPA drafting time by up to 15% and modernize infrastructure reviews.

source_payload.html: OpenAI and Pacific Northwest National Laboratory introduce DraftNEPABench, a new benchmark evaluating how AI coding agents can accelerate federal permitting—showing potential to reduce NEPA drafting time by up to 15% and modernize infrastructure reviews.

items.headline: OpenAI Codex and Figma launch seamless code-to-design experience

content.excerpt_text: OpenAI and Figma launch a new Codex integration that connects code and design, enabling teams to move between implementation and the Figma canvas to iterate and ship faster.

source_payload.html: OpenAI and Figma launch a new Codex integration that connects code and design, enabling teams to move between implementation and the Figma canvas to iterate and ship faster.

items.headline: Disrupting malicious uses of AI | February 2026

content.excerpt_text: Our latest threat report examines how malicious actors combine AI models with websites and social platforms—and what it means for detection and defense.

source_payload.html: Our latest threat report examines how malicious actors combine AI models with websites and social platforms—and what it means for detection and defense.

items.headline: Arvind KC appointed Chief People Officer

content.excerpt_text: OpenAI appoints Arvind KC as Chief People Officer to help scale the company, strengthen its culture, and lead how work evolves in the age of AI.

source_payload.html: OpenAI appoints Arvind KC as Chief People Officer to help scale the company, strengthen its culture, and lead how work evolves in the age of AI.

items.headline: Why we no longer evaluate SWE-bench Verified

content.excerpt_text: SWE-bench Verified is increasingly contaminated and mismeasures frontier coding progress. Our analysis shows flawed tests and training leakage. We recommend SWE-bench Pro.

source_payload.html: SWE-bench Verified is increasingly contaminated and mismeasures frontier coding progress. Our analysis shows flawed tests and training leakage. We recommend SWE-bench Pro.

items.headline: OpenAI: OpenAI announces Frontier Alliance Partners

content.excerpt_text: OpenAI announces Frontier Alliance Partners to help enterprises move from AI pilots to production with secure, scalable agent deployments.

source_payload.html: OpenAI announces Frontier Alliance Partners to help enterprises move from AI pilots to production with secure, scalable agent deployments.

items.headline: Our First Proof submissions

content.excerpt_text: We share our AI model’s proof attempts for the First Proof math challenge, testing research-grade reasoning on expert-level problems.

source_payload.html: We share our AI model’s proof attempts for the First Proof math challenge, testing research-grade reasoning on expert-level problems.

items.headline: Advancing independent research on AI alignment

content.excerpt_text: OpenAI commits $7.5M to The Alignment Project to fund independent AI alignment research, strengthening global efforts to address AGI safety and security risks.

source_payload.html: OpenAI commits $7.5M to The Alignment Project to fund independent AI alignment research, strengthening global efforts to address AGI safety and security risks.

content.excerpt_text: OpenAI for India expands AI access across the country—building local infrastructure, powering enterprises, and advancing workforce skills.

items.headline: Introducing EVMbench

content.excerpt_text: OpenAI and Paradigm introduce EVMbench, a benchmark evaluating AI agents’ ability to detect, patch, and exploit high-severity smart contract vulnerabilities.

source_payload.html: OpenAI and Paradigm introduce EVMbench, a benchmark evaluating AI agents’ ability to detect, patch, and exploit high-severity smart contract vulnerabilities.

items.headline: GPT-5.2 derives a new result in theoretical physics

content.excerpt_text: A new preprint shows GPT-5.2 proposing a new formula for a gluon amplitude, later formally proved and verified by OpenAI and academic collaborators.

source_payload.html: A new preprint shows GPT-5.2 proposing a new formula for a gluon amplitude, later formally proved and verified by OpenAI and academic collaborators.

items.headline: Scaling social science research

items.headline: GPT-5 lowers the cost of cell-free protein synthesis

items.headline: Retiring GPT-4o, GPT-4.1, GPT-4.1 mini, and OpenAI o4-mini in ChatGPT

content.excerpt_text: On February 13, 2026, alongside the previously announced retirement⁠ of GPT‑5 (Instant, Thinking, and Pro), we will retire GPT‑4o, GPT‑4.1, GPT‑4.1 mini, and OpenAI o4-mini from ChatGPT. In the API, there are no changes at this time.

source_payload.html: On February 13, 2026, alongside the previously announced retirement⁠ of GPT‑5 (Instant, Thinking, and Pro), we will retire GPT‑4o, GPT‑4.1, GPT‑4.1 mini, and OpenAI o4-mini from ChatGPT. In the API, there are no changes at this time.
